rows.label: qst102715_msg001
rows.name: おじいちゃん喜んでくれるかな？(仮)

rows.label: qst102715_msg101
rows.name: おじいちゃんと幸せに暮らしてます(仮)

rows.label: qst102715_msg0001
rows.name:
I hope Grandpa's all right...
He seems to be resting a lot
more than he used to.

rows.label: qst102715_msg0002
rows.name:
He hardly ever even comes to watch
the performances any more...

rows.label: qst102715_msg0003
rows.name:
I hope there's a doctor somewhere
who can help him.

rows.label: qst102715_msg0102
rows.name:
Oh, that's great!
I can't wait until she makes
Grandpa better again.
